Headline: Purple Line Delays
ShortDescription: Purple Line trains are running w/residual delays and congestion following an earlier loss of power at Linden terminal. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Purple Line trains are running with residual delays and congestion following an earlier loss of power at Linden terminal.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #34 South Michigan Temporary Reroute at 130th/Indiana
ShortDescription: 34 South Michigan buses are temporarily rerouted via Michigan, 115th, Bishop Ford and 130th due to, street blockage near 130th/Indiana.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#34 South Michigan buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Michigan, 115th, Bishop Ford and 130th due to, street blockage near 130th/Indiana.

Allow extra travel time.
